desc: Enjoy First-Class Style at friendly Fare. US designed canvas/vegan leather travel accessories, bags & more. For men and women alike. One stop shop for all your luggage and lifestyle bags. Duffle bags, toiletry bags, cosmetic bags, briefcases, rolling luggage, handbags, shoulder bags, totes, wine carriers.
